bibl.title: K voprosu o cislennosti monachov v Egipte vo vtoroy polovine IV v. Avec résumé en anglais: On the Relative Number of Monks in Egypt in the 2nd Half of the Fourth Century A.D.
bibl.note: The average percentage of monks constituted about 1,4 - 2 % from the approximate size of Egypt's population.
bibl.seg: VAN'KOVA A.B., K voprosu o cislennosti monachov v Egipte vo vtoroy polovine IV v. Avec résumé en anglais: On the Relative Number of Monks in Egypt in the 2nd Half of the Fourth Century A.D.
The average percentage of monks constituted about 1,4 - 2 % from the approximate size of Egypt's population.
